channel.title: How do i make a mod/admin only zone?
channel.description: [font=comic sans ms]on my server im making it so were you start out is in the duel arena. and the training is there to. but you know were you can go on the walkways and look down at all the dules? i was wanting to make that mod and admin only... [hr] [font=comic sans ms]proud owner of spyro's isle 2 100% done spyro's isle 2 website 100%donewww.freewebs.com/elloolechap spyro's isle 2client 30%done spyro's isle RSC 25%done visit my websie and regester in the forums if you want to get on my server when its back up. by 2006 - 2007 Ello o'le chap productions.

item.title: How do i make a mod/admin only zone?
item.dc:creator: @Newb_2341 Newb 2341
item.description:
@Newb_2341 wrote:

Take your advertising off.
You need to add a new boolean similar to the nonWild one.
Like this sorta:

public boolean StaffZone() { if(playerLevel >= 2); { else if((absX >= 3227 && absX <= 3273 && absY >= 3338 && absY <=3360 )|| heightLevel == 1) return true; else return false; sendMessage("Admins and Mods only zone!"); teleportToX = ....; teleportToY = ....; }

I free-handed it.
Won’t work TBH.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a mod/admin only zone?
